GSD37vaikhd_u:193_1: oṃ bhūr bhuvas tat savitur oṃ suvardhiyo yo na ity ardharcām oṃ bhūr bhuvaḥ suvas
GSD37vaikhd_u:193_2: tat savitur iti samastāṃ casāvitrīṃ japtvā vanāśramaṃ praviśya brahmacarya.vrataṃ \saṃkalpayet).

GSD37vaikhd_u:209: vanyān eva pārthivān vānaspatyānkulīra.udghāta.añchaṇān purāṇān kuśa.darbhān ūrṇā.stukāṃ plakṣa.agraṃ sugandhi.tejanaṃ gugguluṃ hiraṇya.śakalān sūrya.kāntaṃ ca \saṃbharati).

GSD37vaikhd_u:219: / adhastād darbhāṃs tṛṇāni parṇāni vā-āstīryasu.vrataḥ su.vratāṃ patnīṃ vinā-ekaḥ \śayīta).

GSD37vaikhd_u:225: / mūlaiḥ phalaiḥ pattraiḥ puṣpair vātat.tat.kālena pakvaiḥ svayam eva saṃśīrṇaiḥ prāṇaṃ pravartayann uttara.uttare-apy adhikaṃ tapaḥ.saṃyogaṃphalādi.viśiṣtam \ācared).
GSD37vaikhd_u:227_0: / atha vā-āhitāgniḥ sarvān agnīn araṇyāmāropya sarvaiḥ saṃvāpa.mantraiḥ pārthivān
GSD37vaikhd_u:227_1: vānaspatyāṃś ca sarvān samūhyanirmanthya-etena vidhinā-agnim agnyādheya.vidhānena
GSD37vaikhd_u:230_0: / a.patnīkaś ca bhikṣuvad agnau homaṃhutvā-araṇyādi.pātrāṇi ca prakṣipya putre bhāryāṃ
GSD37vaikhd_u:230_1: nidhāya tathā-agnīn ātmany āropyavalkala.upavīta.ādīn bhikṣā.pātraṃ ca saṃgṛhya-
GSD37vaikhd_u:232: / tapasāṃ śramaṇam etan mūlaṃ tasmād etadvidhānam enam agniṃ ca śrāmaṇakam ity \āha) vikhanāḥ.
GSD37vaikhd_u:234: / saṃnyāsa.kramaṃ. saptaty.ūrdhvaṃvṛddho-an.apatyo vidhuro vā janma.mṛtyu.jarā.ādīn vicintya yoga.arthī yadā \syāt) tad.
GSD37vaikhd_u:236: / atha vā putre bhāryāṃ nikṣipya paramātmanibuddhiṃ niveśya vanāt saṃnyāsaṃ \kuryāt).

GSD37vaikhd_u:238_1: kāṣāyaṃ kamaṇḍalum ap.pavitraṃ mṛd.grahaṇīṃ bhikṣā.pātraṃ ca saṃbhṛtya trivṛtaṃ prāśya-
GSD37vaikhd_u:238_2: upavāsaṃkṛtvā dine-apare prātaḥ snātvā-agnihotraṃ vaiśvadevaṃ ca hutvā vaiśvānaraṃ

GSD37vaikhd_u:499_1: mantrais tri.daṇḍaṃ saṃnyasya savye yad asya pārerajasa iti śikyam ap.pavitram udare
GSD37vaikhd_u:499_2: sāvitryā bhikṣā.pātraṃ guhyapradeśe bhūmir bhūmimiti kāṣāyaṃ mṛd.grahaṇīṃ kamaṇḍaluṃ
GSD37vaikhd_u:500: Vaikh 03.08.(139.1-2) tasmin sṛgāla.ādibhiḥ spṛṣṭe tat.kartā pāpīyān\bhavati).
GSD37vaikhd_u:502: / āhitāgner agnīn ātmany āropya saṃnyasino mṛtaṃdehaṃ gāyatryā snāpayitvā pūrvavad vāhayitvā śuddhe deśe nidhāya laukika.agnau tadagnim \upāvaroha)
GSD37vaikhd_u:503: -ity avaropya pavitraṃ ta-iti ghṛta.kṣīram āsye prakṣipya pūrvavattri.daṇḍa.ādīn vinyasya brahmamedhena pitṛmedhena vā-āhitāgni.mantrais tad.agnibhir dahanam\ācarati).
GSD37vaikhd_u:507: / tad.vahanaṃ khanitvā pidhānaṃ dahanaṃnārāyaṇa.baliṃ vā yaḥ \kuryāt)
GSD37vaikhd_u:510_0: nārāyaṇa.baliṃ nārāyaṇād evasarvārtha.siddhir iti brahmaṇa.ādyair narair hatasya-ātma.ghātinorajju.śastra.udaka.aśani.daṃṣṭri.paśu.sarpa.ādibhiḥ
GSD37vaikhd_u:510_1: sarvapāpa.mṛtasya-adāhyānām anyeṣāṃ bhikṣoś ca-ekādaśa.dinād ūrdhvaṃ mahāpātakināṃ
GSD37vaikhd_u:514: / apare-ahani viṣṇor ālaya.pārśve nadī.tīregṛhe vā-agni.āyatanaṃ kṛtvā-āghāraṃ \juhuyād).
GSD37vaikhd_u:516_0: / agniṃ paristīrya-agner vāyavyāṃ viṣṭaredarbheṣu tad.rūpaṃ suvarṇaṃ vā saṃsthāpya
GSD37vaikhd_u:516_1: puruṣaṃ dhyāyann oṃ bhūḥ puruṣam ity -ādyaiḥprāṅ.mukhaṃ devaṃ nārāyaṇam āvāhya-āsana.pādya.ācamanāni \dadyāt).
GSD37vaikhd_u:523: / pariṣicya sahasraśīrṣa.ādyair viṣṇor nuka.ādyairdvādaśa.nāmabhiś ca-ājyaṃ caruṃ \juhuyāt).
GSD37vaikhd_u:525: / guḍa.ājya.phala.yuktaṃ pāyasaṃ havirviṣṇu.gāyatryā deva.īśāya nivedya pādya.ācamana.mukha.vāsaṃ \dadyāt).
GSD37vaikhd_u:528_1: paraṃjyotiṣe parabrahmaṇe- avyaktāya sarvakāraṇāya yajña.īśvarāyayajñātmane viśvebhyo
GSD37vaikhd_u:528_2: devebhyaḥ sarvābhyo devatābhyaḥ sādhyebhya-ity antaiḥ pāyasaṃ baliṃ\dattvā)
GSD37vaikhd_u:531_0: brāhmaṇān pādau prakṣālya navānivastra.uttarīya.ābharaṇāni dattvā puṣpa.ādyaiḥ pūjayitvā
GSD37vaikhd_u:531_1: dvādaśa.mūrtiṃ dhyāyann upadaṃśa.ghṛta.guḍa.dadhi.phala.yuktaṃ śvetam annaṃ bhojayitvāyathā.śakti
GSD37vaikhd_u:535: Vaikh 03.10.(141.1-2)/ abhīṣṭāṃ parāṃ gatiṃ sa gatvā viṣṇor loke\mahīyate).
GSD37vaikhd_u:537: / cāturvarṇya.saṃkareṇa-utpannānām anuloma.pratiloma.antarāla.vrātyānām utpattiṃ nāma vṛttiṃ ca.-
GSD37vaikhd_u:543: / brahmaṇo mukhād udbhūtā brāhmaṇā brāhmaṇyaś ca brahma.ṛṣayaḥ patnyo \babhūvus).
GSD37vaikhd_u:545: / teṣāṃ gātra.utpannād brāhmaṇyāṃ a.sagotrāyāṃvidhinā sa.mantrakaṃ gṛhītāyāṃ jāto brāhmaṇaḥ śuddho \bhavet).
GSD37vaikhd_u:547: vidhi.hīnam anya.pūrvāyāṃ golakohartṛkāyāṃ kuṇḍaś ca viprau dvau ninditau \syātāṃ ).
GSD37vaikhd_u:549: / tasmād adho bāhubhyāmāt kṣatriyāt kṣatriyāyāṃ vidhivat-jātaḥ kṣatriyaḥ śuddhas.
GSD37vaikhd_u:555: Vaikh 03.11.(141.15-142.1)/ adhastād ūrubhyāmād vaiśyād vaiśyāyāṃ tathā vaiśyaḥ śuddho.
GSD37vaikhd_u:557: Vaikh 03.12.(142.3)/ atha padbhyām utpannāt-śūdrāt-śudrāyāṃ nyāyenaśūdraḥ śuddhaḥ.
GSD37vaikhd_u:561: Vaikh 03.12.(142.6-7)/ brāhmaṇāt kṣatriya.kanyāyāṃ jātaḥ savarṇo-anulomeṣu mukhyo.
GSD37vaikhd_u:563: asya vṛttir ātharvaṇaṃkarma.aśva.hasti.ratha.saṃvāhanam ārohaṇaṃ rajñaḥ saināpatyaṃ ca-āyurveda.kṛtyaṃ.
GSD37vaikhd_u:565: Vaikh 03.12.(142.9)/ abhiṣiktaś cet-nṛpo bhūyād aṣṭāṅgam āyurvedaṃbhūta.tantraṃ vā \saṃpaṭet).
GSD37vaikhd_u:570: Vaikh 03.12.(142.13)/ jarāt kumbhakāraḥ kulāla.vṛttir na-āpito nābherūrdhva.vaptā ca.
GSD37vaikhd_u:572: / kṣatriyād vaiśyāyāṃ madguḥ śreṣṭhitvaṃ prāpto mahānarma.ākhyaś ca vaiśya.vṛttiḥ kṣātram karma na-\ācarati).
GSD37vaikhd_u:582: / tato-anulomād anulomāyāṃ jātaś ca-anulomaḥpitur mātur vā jātaṃ vṛttiṃ \bhajeta).
GSD37vaikhd_u:584: / kṣatriyād viprakanyāyāṃ mantravat- jātaḥ sūtaḥpratilomeṣu mukhyo-ayaṃ mantrahīna.upanīto dvijadharma.hīno.
GSD37vaikhd_u:585: Vaikh 03.13.(143.9)/ asya vṛttir dharma.anubodhanaṃ rājño-anna.saṃskāraś ca.
GSD37vaikhd_u:587: / jāreṇa mantrahīna.jo rathakārodvijatva.vihīnaḥ śūdra.kṛtyo- aśvānāṃ poṣaṇa.damanādi.paricaryā.jīvī.
GSD37vaikhd_u:589: / vaiśyād brāhmaṇyāṃ māgadhaḥ. śūdrair apyabhojyān no- aspṛśyaḥ sarvavandī praśaṃsā.kīrtana.gāna.preṣaṇa.vṛttir.
GSD37vaikhd_u:591: Vaikh 03.14.(143.14-15)/ vaiśyān nṛpāyām āyogavas tantu.vāyaḥ paṭa.kartā vastra.kāṃsya.uapjīvī.
GSD37vaikhd_u:594: / śūdrāt kṣatriyāyāṃ pulkasaḥ kṛtakāṃ vāārkṣāṃ vā surāṃ \hutvā)
GSD37vaikhd_u:598: / śūdrād vaiśyāyāṃ vaidehakaḥ śūdra.aspṛśyastair apy abhojya.anno vanya.vṛttir aja.mahiṣa.gopālas tad.rasān vikrayī.
GSD37vaikhd_u:601_1: yatas tataś caran sarvakarma.bahiṣkṛtaḥ pūrvāhṇe grāma.ādau vīthyām anyatra-api malāny
GSD37vaikhd_u:603: Vaikh 03.14.(144.6-7)/ madhyāhnāt paraṃ grāme na \viśaty)/ ayaṃ.
GSD37vaikhd_u:608: / cūcukād viprāyāṃ takṣako-aspṛśyojhallarī.hasto dārukāraḥ suvarṇakāro-ayaskāraḥ kāṃsyakāro vā.
GSD37vaikhd_u:613: Vaikh 03.15.(144.13-14)/ kṣatriyāyām adhonāpito nābher adho roma.vaptā.
GSD37vaikhd_u:620: Vaikh 03.15.(144.17-18) khananān nṛpāyām udbandhakaḥ śūdra.aspṛśyo vastra.nirṇejakaḥ.
GSD37vaikhd_u:623: / caṇḍālād viprāyāṃ śvapacaḥ caṇḍālavaccihna.yukto nitya.nindyaḥ sarvakarma.bahiṣkāryo nagaryādau mala.apohakaḥ śmaśāne \vasan)
GSD37vaikhd_u:626: / vadhyān hatvā tad.vastrādi.grāhīparādhīna.āhāro bhinnapātra.bhojī śvamāṃsa.bhakṣī carma.vāra.vāṇa.vāṇijya.kārī \syāt).
GSD37vaikhd_u:627: Vaikh 03.15.(145.4-5)/ tasmān nikṛṣṭe sute samutpanne patito naṣṭoghorān narakān \vrajati).
GSD37vaikhd_u:628: Vaikh 03.15.(145.5-6)/ sat.putro narakebhyas trāyakaḥ pitṛṛn\pāvayitvā)/ śubhāṃl lokān \nayati).
